(numRCQEntries, nL2TLBEntries).explanation: These are independent microarchitectural parameters where the number of request completion queue entries does not directly influence the number of L2 TLB entries;

(numRCQEntries, area).explanation: Increasing the number of request completion queue entries requires additional hardware resources, directly increasing the total chip area;

(numRCQEntries, area_cell_count).explanation: More request completion queue entries necessitate additional storage cells and logic gates, directly increasing the total cell count on the chip;
